languages.text: "Тогда я буду смиренно точить клинки и ждать, когда оно появится".
"Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."
languages.original_text: "Тогда я буду смиренно точить клинки и ждать, когда оно появится".

traits.locale_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades and wait for it to appear."
"Then I will humbly sharpen my blades and wait for it to appear."
"Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its appearance."
"Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its appearance."
"Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."
"Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."

languages.text: "Dann werde ich demütig meine Klingen schärfen und auf die Ankunft warten."
languages.original_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich demütig meine Klingen schärfen und auf die Ankunft warten."

languages.text: «Entonces afilaré humildemente mis dagas mientras espero su llegada».
languages.original_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces afilaré humildemente mis dagas mientras espero su llegada».

languages.text: 「では、私は静かに刃を研ぎながら到着を待つことにするわ」
languages.original_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."

traits.locale_text: 「では、私は静かに刃を研ぎながら到着を待つことにするわ」

languages.text: “既然如此，我便谦卑地磨砺我的利刃，等待仪式开始。”
languages.original_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我便谦卑地磨砺我的利刃，等待仪式开始。”

languages.text: « Alors, j'affûterai humblement mes lames en attendant son arrivée. »
languages.original_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, j'affûterai humblement mes lames en attendant son arrivée. »

languages.original_text: "Then I will humbly sharpen my blades as I await its arrival."
